entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:17 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -19.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 10:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -19.1°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 23 except minus 15 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23 except minus 15 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. High minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
